title: New Account Problems
body:
So I moved to Korea a couple months ago (military) and I found its really hard to get onto the KR server so I figured I would just make an account on the Japan server cause its still stupid close compared to the US servers. Anyway, I went on over to the JP league site, made an account, downloaded the client and all that. But whenever I try to login on that server/account it just comes up with an error message (which is in japanese and I can't read) but I know I am putting in the right login info because when I type in the wrong password, its a different error message. I have tried switching servers on my NA client, and I have tried using the JP client I downloaded but its the same error. Anyone have any advice?

TL;DR I made a Japan server account and can't login to the client, please help.

replies.body: If you know it's a different message than the incorrect password one, it's like to be the network connection error message instead =\ . This might be related to how your connection is being routed, so do me a quick favor and try running through the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as some basic troubleshooting. You may also need to contact the JP account support to see exactly what's going on.
So JP contacted me finally and told me that they just don't support the KR area. Ran my IP through a VPN and that worked to log me in, but We'll see how well it goes from here.
